name: Blow Away Survivors
description:
Blow Away Survivors is a casual action game with unique elements of "manual attack," "knockdown" and "blow away "in addition to the Rogue-lite elements. You can also defeat enemies, develop characters, and learn powerful auto-activated skills. Use them to defeat the enemy's large army and powerful boss.

Features
Besides HP, the enemy has a parameter called knockdown gauge. Attacking can reduce the knockdown gauge, and when the gauge reaches zero, the enemy knocks down on the spot for a period of time.
A manual attack on a knockdown enemy can blow it wide. You can also attack a blown enemy by hitting another enemy and enjoy a very exhilarating battle.
Manual attacks can be carried out with two types of buttons. A variety of manual attacks can be carried out with intuitive and simple operations, such as continuous attacks by simply hitting buttons, strong attacks by moving and pressing buttons at the same time, and special attacks by pressing buttons immediately after evasion.

With the elements of "manual attack," "knockdown," and "blow away, ""you can refreshingly defeat a large army of enemies, and enjoy the feeling of inflation that grows stronger and stronger as you earn your gangan experience! Blow Away Survivors is a quick taste of that.
